0.annotation: Remove unknown nodes, plugins, callbacks, scriptjobs
0.command: from takTools.utils import globalUtil;import imp;imp.reload(globalUtil); globalUtil.cleanupMayaScene()

1.command:
from takTools.utils import system as sysUtil
import imp
imp.reload(sysUtil)

sysUtil.clearOutputWindow()

3.command:
from takTools.common import iconMaker
import imp
imp.reload(iconMaker)

gui = iconMaker.IconMakerGUI()
gui.show()

4.annotation: Save specific scene information as a file.
4.command:
import takTools.pipeline.tak_saveSceneInfo as tak_saveSceneInfo
import imp
imp.reload(tak_saveSceneInfo)
tak_saveSceneInfo.ui()

9.command:

cam = pm.selected()[0]
camUtils.shakeCamera(cam)
